lines.text: So, you're fired, that's what, now get out!
Oh, I can't, eh? Get out!
There's a little slip of paper, I believe they call it a contract. You know, where two minds meet and one of them gets the worst of it.
I'll break it, if I have to!
Grant McKenzie doesn't draw that kind of contract.
All right, drag me through the courts
Okay, sweetheart, I'll be suin' ya!
[Waves and closes the door behind him]

[Radio Commercial]
Seven thirty-one. Time to get the children up, mother and make sure they put on their Play-Proof Stockings.

[Radio Commercial]
Quarter to eight. Put down your paper, Dad. Cook's Country Sausage is best when hot.
